item.title: katta @ Berlin
item.description: katta @ Berlin # After finishing the slides for next week’s Mahout course at TU Berlin (if you are not subscribed yet: Subscribe now!) I spent half of the day in Tierpark Berlin: Watching ice-bears, taking pictures of tigers. On my way through the park I met those cute little guys: The plate next to the bawn gave them away as … kattas - so that is what they look like!
